title: Workshop on Leveraging Recommendation Systems for Learning Design Reuse

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital educational tools and understanding of fundamental language education concepts
context.additional_context: Project-based course on reusing existing learning designs and applying recommendation systems when designing language education for general citizens

learning_goals: Explanation of the educational value of learning design reuse (e.g., dissemination of best practices, enhancement of educational effectiveness).
Selection and application of suitable learning designs using explanatory features based on a recommendation system.
Development of two or more reusable language education designs through project-based activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
